Ranger's Boots

boots (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 250
reinvigoration [reinvigoration]: 2
stealth bonus [stealthb]: +20
(forest-survival [forest])

Requires 5N to forge (N1)

These magic boots are made for rangers and scouts who need to move far and without being noticed. The boots make their wearer recover from fatigue very quickly and will also enable him to move more stealthily.
